Kolkata Team is a franchise cricket team that represents the city of Kolkata in Indian T20 League. Bollywood actress Juhi Chawla, her husband Jay Mehta, and actor Shah Rukh Khan own the franchise. The magnificent Eden Gardens stadium hosts the Kolkata team. Gautam Gambhir is the team’s all-time leading run-scorer. Sunil Narine is the leading wicket-taker of the team. 

The Delhi team is a franchise cricket team which represents Delhi in the Indian Cricket League tournaments. The team is owned by the GMR group and the JSW group jointly. Arun Jaitley Stadium is the home ground of this team. The team reached the finals for the first time in 2020. The Shaheed Veer Narayan Singh International Stadium, Raipur is the second home ground of this team.

Head-to-Head Record of Kolkata vs Delhi

The Delhi team is slightly ahead of the Kolkata team in the Indian Cricket League. In the season’s history so far, both sides have played with each other 20 times, of which 11 have been won by the Delhi team and eight by the Kolkata team.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” Top Performance in Batting of Kolkata VS Delhi

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_text_color=”#dddddd” text_font_size=”16px” header_4_font=”Nova Flat||||||||” header_4_text_color=”#FC575E” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]● Shreyas Iyer – 570 runs (Kolkata team)
● Rishabh Pant -650 runs (Delhi team)
● Prithvi Shaw – 400 runs (Delhi team)

Shreyas has ruled the charts ever since the Indian Cricket League hosted the Delhi vs Kolkata matches. He has scored 570 runs, Rishabh Pant scored 650, and Kuldeep Yadav has scored 400 runs. Both teams are playing well and giving their best performance.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Roster” _builder_version=”4.14.5″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#121a25″ background_color_gradient_end=”#002e54″ background_image=”http://www.my11circle.com/fantasy-sports/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/cricket-icon-04.png” background_size=”contain” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_text_color=”#dddddd” text_font_size=”16px” header_3_font=”Nova Flat||||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#fc575e” header_3_font_size=”28px” header_3_line_height=”1.7em” text_orientation=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Top Performers in Bowling of Kolkata VS Delhi

Most Wickets

● Axar Patel – 10 (Delhi team)
● Rinku Singh – 8 (Kolkata team)
● Kuldeep Yadav – 7 (Delhi team)

Best Bowling

● Shardul Thakur – 5/16 (Delhi team)
● Umesh Yadav – 5/18 (Kolkata team)
● Mohammad Nabi – 5/20 (Kolkata team)

The chart clearly shows a mixed performance of both teams, where the Delhi Team takes more wickets, and the Kolkata bowlers give great competition.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0C101B” background_color_gradient_start=”#002e54″ background_color_gradient_end=”#121a25″ background_image=”http://www.my11circle.com/fantasy-sports/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/esports-icon-2-4.png” background_size=”initial” background_blend=”overlay” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_image=”off” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” header_3_font=”Nova Flat||||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#fc575e” header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Tips For Picking Your Fantasy Team

Check player performance
Before using one for the team, check that player’s performance thoroughly. Does he play in recent matches? Don’t make a judgment based on previous games.

 Players’ availability

Picking a player who is unavailable for the game is the single misstep you must never make in Fantasy League. It’ll come in handy if you do some homework, especially if you’re in a fantasy league where the teams are sealed before the throw.

Weather and pitch report
In many cases, fantasy players do not give attention to weather and pitch reports, but it is advised for all fantasy players to get updated because slow and dry pitch needs spin bowlers rather than swing bowlers.

Compare player performances

Do not get emotional for your favorite player, put your emotion aside, compare the player performances, and then make your fantasy cricket team.

Go with the gaming conditions
Choose the players based on who they’re up against right now. Then, when the opposition’s bowling line-up is tightened, be bold and avoid hitting the opening batsman. This is where the winners stand out. They don’t usually pick their players based on their previous game or the previous year’s performances (in some cases) unless they are in their prime form.
